This game is 9 years old as of date and it is still awesome, graphics are great if you got the hardware and co op is ice it's even better that the community is still active a bit
A fantastic and original game with a great story.
the custom maps make this the best puzzle game in the world

I really love everything about this game I could play it for hours
Once the main story is over theres still the element of custom test chambers so theres basically always new content from creators to play
Look up Portal:Mel. Great story, art, powerful music! Good puzzles and sleek mechanics. Best valve title next to TF2!

The ending for singleplayer was the best I've ever seen
Good game. Very glad Cave Johnson didn't ask me for pictures of Spider-Man
A sad tale about a girl (Chell) and her robot best friend-nemesis/ mother (Glados).
Really good game. Well designed physics, a great sequel to the original.

Portal isn't about why. It's about why not.

I rest my case.
With 49 hours at the moment and almost completed the game I would strongly recommend for anyone who loves challenging puzzle's and good a good story line. I give it a 9.5/10
Honestly valve has made a lot of good games from half life to left 4 dead and this game takes the cake(literally).

Oh... It's you.	

It's been a long time. How have you been?	

I've been really busy being dead. You know, after you MURDERED ME.	

Okay. Look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For science... You monster.

This game is brilliant! Its a must buy for all gamers, either casual or competitive. I had played this game a while back on console and it was stunning! Bought it again on PC and it is just as amazing as before!

My all time #1 favorite game.

Valve, count to three, just this once.

Please...

A fantastic game on its own without mods, and the mods push it closer to absolute glory. 10/10, a must if you own VR. This has been my only means of working out during the COVID-19 quarantine, and it works. I always end up sweating buckets and smelling like an ape. My arms are constantly sore, but like most people who play beatsaber, that doesn't stop them. Buy the game for yourself or a friend who has VR and you'll see for yourself, it's addicting.
My favorite game of all time, a must play!
